Package org.techbd.service

Class DocResourcesService.NodeAide

java.lang.Object
org.techbd.service.DocResourcesService.NodeAide
Enclosing class:
DocResourcesService
public class DocResourcesService.NodeAide extends Object
Utility class to access node's content in a manner convenient for Thymeleaf or others.

      public Object attributeExpr(Paths<String,? extends ResourceProvenance<? extends Provenance,Resource<? extends Nature,?>>>.Node node, String propertyPath, Optional<Object> defaultValue)
      Retrieves the value of a nested property from a node's attributes map using Spring Expression Language (SpEL).
      Parameters:
      node - the node containing the attributes map
      propertyPath - the dot-notated path to the property
      Returns:
      the value of the nested property, or an exception message if an error occurs
